predicate.note: Frames file for 'preside' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry.

example.name: object always takes 'over'
example.text: Today, Mr. Corry presides over a company whose fortunes have changed abruptly.
example.arg: a company whose fortunes have changed abruptly

example.name: nominal
example.text: John Rose, president *t* and chief executive officer *t* of New England Electric, said ...
